Subject: Back at the Alliance Base

::Reptilica/Zardus::

The shuttle flies into the clearing containing the Alliance bace, landing and 
opening the hatch. Inside, Reptilica nervioustly stands up, walking toward 
the exit.

"We're here," he says, looking outside.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus frowns as he recieves Wheeljack's transmission, looking at Squizzy in 
surprize as he hears her question.

"No, she's not. She's a visiting scientist, here to demonstrate an 
experiment. Stay here and overlook her work, see if its worthwhile for us," 
he says, "I've got something to take care of."

He walks out of the room, heading for the entrance. "I'll meet you and the 
probe at the entrance, Wheeljack," he says over his comm to Wheeljack.
